Option: filesystem.path

This option sets the default path used by the file manager, this path should always be above the root path otherwise MCFileManager will treat this as a possible hack attempt and disable all logic. This path will only be used when the user starts up the MCFileManager when the user goes to a specific directory that path will be used instead. Notice this path can be relative or absolute.

Example of usage in the config.php file:

$mcFileManagerConfig['filesystem.path'] = "/somedir1/somedir2";

Example of usage in a mc_access file:

filesystem.path=/somedir1/somedir2
